Reviews.Title: Generic Photo Taker
Reviews.Author: Carol Rohe "carohe"
Reviews.Content: I sell on Ebay and I needed something that would do the job and this camera is a nice little camera for that.  And it's came in handy for other situations too.  With the updated technology, this is probably not for the real professional, but for the one who needs easy pictures to be taken and for more generic items; this will do the job.  There is not a lot of storage on the disc either...13 pictures at a time.  But I like it for what I need it for.

Reviews.Title: No audio
Reviews.Author: Joseph L. Silva "Joe Silva"
Reviews.Content: I got this camera for my daughter, who is 6, because she loves to take pictures and shoot video. I got the camera because of its high resolution, and never thought twice to ensure it actually had audio. One would think a camera that shot video would have audio. Right? Wrong. I guess when they made this, they decided to ad video capture without thinking about the fact that there is no microphone.I sent it back.

Reviews.Title: Grandaughter's delight
Reviews.Author: Jo Ann Masterjohn
Reviews.Content: My Grandaughter just loves her camera. Pink, being her color, was a big hit in itself. The fact that it was small and easy to take pictures, gave her reason to sneek it to school and get pictures of all her friends. She's learning the ease of it needs to have it's place though. It's a good purchase. She'll start her photography love, sooner than she expected she was going to.

Reviews.Title: VIDEO without SOUND ??!!
Reviews.Author: Rico
Reviews.Content: This camera was a gift from someone, so i thought nothing of the video until i tried to film something then realized that it does not have sound,.so i thought it was something in the settings, i looked it over until i was nearly blind,.not seeing anything for sound,this has got to be the most lame thing any company could do, i think they should replace every camera that anyone has with a REAL camera that has sound !

Reviews.Title: Very nice camera, bought for my niece.
Reviews.Author: Thomas X. Rinaldi
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for my 7 year old niece and she LOVES it.  She takes it everywhere with her. Highly recommend.  Easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Pretty in Pink
Reviews.Author: Jeanette M. Johnson
Reviews.Content: Got this for my granddaughter's sixteenth birthday present.  She was delighted especially since the camera was pink.  She has been enjoying and loving it.  The only thing that I was disappointed with was that the memory card was different and didn't fit into the photo printer I have.  It does have a cable to connect to the computer however.

Reviews.Title: Poor choice!
Reviews.Author: Nadav S. Shaham
Reviews.Content: I got this for my 10 year old daughter for Christmas and what a disappointment!!!Take three photos and the Batteries are dead! No joke!Pictures are not sharp!Total waste of funds!!!

Reviews.Title: Review based on Shipping/Vendor and not camera
Reviews.Author: W. Sager
Reviews.Content: I would love to be able to review this camera, but I can't as it has yet to arrive.  It was to be a Christmas present for my daughter.Granted, I did order the camera late (Dec 20), but I did pay extra shipping so that it would arrive by 12/24/09.  But the camera never arrived.In checking the tracking of the item, UPS did not pickup the item until 12/21.  Everything else I ordered the same day was in the hands of the shipper (UPS/FedEx/USPS) on 12/20.Worse, I have been tracking this package daily.  First UPS posted that it arrived in Secaucus NJ (from California) on 12/24.  Too late to arrive by Christmas, but at least would have it on Monday - right?On Monday, 12/28/09, I checked again, but this time the UPS tracking indicated that the package arrived in Secaucus at 9:41 AM.  Ok, perhaps it would arrive late in the afternoon, or at worst, Teusday morning.I just checked the status again today (12/29) as the package hasn't arrived.  Now according to UPS, the package arrived in Seacaus at 3:20 pm on 12/29/09!!!WTF????  Why does the "ARRIVAL DATE" keep changing?  First the 24th, then the 28th, and now the 29th.  How is that possible?  Sure looks like someone is falsifying information.Secondly, if you PAY EXTRA to have the package shipped by 12/24 - why the hell does it take 8 days to go from California to NJ???What did UPS do, send it on one of their little brown delivery trucks - that kept delivering packages for 3,000 miles?  No way it should take 8 days for anything to get from Ca to NJ via UPS.Interesting to note, today's vendor (7th Avenue Electronics) is not the same vendor as when I ordered the camera.  Guess I should have waited, as the camera is cheaper today than it was on the 12/20 "Gold Box" special.

ProductInfo.Features:
12-megapixel resolution for photo-quality prints up to 20 x 30 inches
3x optical zoom; 2.5-inch LCD
Capture images to xD-Picture Card or microSD (not included)
ProductInfo.Name: Olympus FE-26 12MP Digital Camera with 3x Optical Zoom and 2.7 inch LCD (Pink)
